EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Please be aware that our friends from the Guangzhou Football Academy will be running a Holiday Football Camp during next week's school holiday.
If you would like further information please CLICK HERE or contact the coaches from the Academy directly through guangzhoufa@gmail.com.
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
